headline: Bristol Myers price target raised to $40 from $37 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley analyst Terence Flynn raised the firm’s price target on Bristol Myers (BMY) to $40 from $37 and keeps an Underweight rating on the shares. 2026 revenue and EPS guidance came in above consensus, but was driven by a higher than expected Eliquis guide, the analyst tells investors in a research note.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximi

headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Bristol Myers’s (BMY) Cobenfy Drug
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Bristol Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer talked about. Bristol Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in the world. Its shares are up by 7.5% over the past year and by 15.4% year-to-date. Piper Sandler […]

headline: Big Pharma's Earnings Week: Strong Performance, Obesity Wars, LOE Management And More
summary: Big pharma Q4 2025 beats: Lilly leads obesity/diabetes, Novo faces 2026 pressure, LOE transitions in focus.
